protocol.name: P-GSE62163-1
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings following parameters were used for statistical analysis Summarization Algorithm: GCRMA Technology: Affymetrix.GeneChip.ATH1-121501 Normalization: Quantile Baseline Transformation: Median of all samples Statistical Analysis p-value cut-off: 0.05 Selected Test :  2way ANOVA p-value computation:       Asymptotic Multiple Testing Correction:   Benjamini-Hochberg Files with differential expression analysis are available on the series record.   To get a good grasp on changes during stress, we restricted our focus to no-stress (0 h) and HS (1 h and 3 h) conditions for differential expression analysis. Hence, gene expression change data at 6h R is not included ID_REF =  VALUE = average GC-RMA of three biological replicates

protocol.name: P-GSE62163-2
protocol.text: Heat stress was given to 21-day-old seedlings by exposing to 43°C for 1 h and 3 h. Seedlings exposed to 43°C for 3 h were allowed to recover at 22°C for a period of 6 h

protocol.name: P-GSE62163-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis ecotype Columbia (Col) seedlings were grown for 21 days on 1X Murashige and Skoog (MS) nutrient medium (Sigma, St. Louis) supplemented with either 1 µM EBR or 0.01% ethanol

protocol.name: P-GSE62163-4
protocol.text: Plant tissue above the medium was collected from unstressed (0 h), heat stressed (1 h and 3 h) and recovering (6 hR) seedlings and quick-frozen for RNA extraction. To minimize the effect of variation among seedlings, plant material from at least 30 seedlings was pooled for each treatment.

protocol.name: P-GSE62163-5
text: Probe preparation and array hybridization were performed according to Affymetrix GeneChip Techincal Analysis Manual (Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA, USA) at the London Regional Genomics Centre (LRGC; Robarts Research Institute, London, ON, Canada;

protocol.name: P-GSE62163-6
protocol.text: Biotin-labeled complimentary RNA (cRNA) was hybridized to Arabidopsis ATH1 GeneChips for 16 h at 45°C.

protocol.name: P-GSE62163-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned with the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000
